txt.en:
'Garvir has taken to overseeing the rebuilding efforts of Barad Rill.

'He will be eager to see a friendly face. Travel south to Barad Rill and see if you can aid him in any way.

'It was good to see you again, [placeholder]. Be well.'

'Well if it isn't [placeholder].

'I am glad to see you well!

'I received word from Herion at Parth Rest that you had been lending us your aid once again.'
Herion asks you to venture to Barad Rill where Garvir is overseeing the efforts to rebuild the ruined lighthouse.
Herion wants you to talk to Garvir at Barad Rill to see if he needs help.\n\nGarvir can be found in Barad Rill to the south.
Talk to Garvir at Barad Rill
